children.text: On layer 3 entry: a as in tree
On layer 4 entry: as in  turtle and tomato
On layer 5 entry: as in tent
On Layer 8: Touching object will make read aloud that object name

events.title: Layout 3 .Layer 10: Game to identify the objects starting with sound 't'

children.text: On click of success, play 'tring', star awards and also refresh the page for next set of objects to play; he objectSerial for 't' TRUE objects are RESERVED from 81-100; THE FALSE objects of 'a' are RESERVED from 101 - 120
On click of wrong objects, play 'bloop'
Entry and exit control of true and false objects
Layer 10: play 't' sound after instruction(instruction is given in the function call displayObjecton Screen())

actions.text: If togglePosition is 'true', swap Position1 >> Position 3
If togglePosition is 'false', swap Position2 >> Position 3
